text:
Hi,

is it possible to add below constants value to the
org.apache.batik.util.SVGConstants

SVG_MARKER_ATTRIBUTE = "marker"
SVG_MARKER_START_ATTRIBUTE = "marker-start"
SVG_MARKER_MID_ATTRIBUTE = "marker-mid"
SVG_MARKER_END_ATTRIBUTE = "marker-end"

text:
Sorry, They already defined in the CSSConstants. 
Just ignore this issue
